definition: Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (UAE)
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Ecclestone said at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix at the weekend that he had doubts about whether the race would happen.
sentences.chinese: 伯尼说这周末举行的阿布扎比大奖赛也可能被取消。

sentences.english: Abu Dhabi bails out its neighbour. What will it ask in return?
sentences.chinese: 阿布扎比向邻国注资。它会要求回报吗？

sentences.english: Q. Why hasn't Abu Dhabi come to Dubai's aid?
sentences.chinese: 阿布扎比为什么不帮迪拜一把？

sentences.english: Abu Dhabi is one of seven semiautonomous emirates that make up the UAE.
sentences.chinese: 阿布扎比是阿联酋七个半自治酋长国之一。

sentences.english: In next-door emirate Abu Dhabi, average home prices fell 5%.
sentences.chinese: 在与迪拜相邻的阿布扎比，平均房价下跌了5%。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (Tw)

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2
